response.original_title: 「呪霊ハンター」死を描く女 封印された怪奇事件ファイル
response.overview: Three ghost hunters finally come together to uncover the mysteries of a sealed case! Koike Souhiko, a detective and writer who enjoyed a cult following on the TV show "Unbilibaboru".... Sayuri Ono, who became a manga artist after working as a race coon with outstanding promotion.... A photographer, Kaos Sumikura, who has caused a stir by providing numerous ghost photo videos for a TV special on ghosts... A unique and hard-hitting documentary on ghosts, in which A-class special investigators investigate bizarre cases and bizarre murders that have been kept under wraps by the media! Includes "The Woman Who Draws Death," "Sleepless Village," and others.
response.title: "Jurei Hunter" Shi wo Egaku Onna Fuinsareta Kaiki Jiken File

titles.title: 呪霊ハンター 死を描く女
